other_tests.findings: Sheets of large transformed cells with dysplastic nuclei, focal epidermotropism, and small lymphocytes with cerebriform nuclei.
Abnormal lymphocytic infiltrate with epidermotropism diagnostic of mycosis fungoides.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Four years prior to the onset of tumors.

other_tests.findings: Large irregular lymphocytes that were CD3- and CD45RO-positive but CD30-negative, consistent with large T-cell lymphoma arising as transformed mycosis fungoides.
Failed to demonstrate a clonal T-cell population in the blood or skin.

other_tests.procedure_name: Serologic and polymerase chain reaction testing
other_tests.findings: Negative for evidence of human T-lymphotropic virus I and II (HTLV-I/II).
